code: var COMPARE=1,SWAP=2,ALREDY_SORTED=3,NEW_SORTED_COLOR=4,PREVIOUS_COLOR=5;var bubbleSort=function bubbleSort(Arr){var objArr=[];var arr=Arr.slice();for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){for(var j=0;j<arr.length-i-1;j++){objArr.push({case:COMPARE,start:j,end:j+1});if(arr[j+1]<arr[j]){objArr.push({case:SWAP,start:j,end:j+1,barOneHeight:"".concat(arr[j+1],"px"),barTwoHeight:"".concat(arr[j],"px")});var temp=arr[j];arr[j]=arr[j+1];arr[j+1]=temp;}else{objArr.push({case:ALREDY_SORTED,start:j,end:j+1});}objArr.push({case:PREVIOUS_COLOR,start:j,end:j+1});}objArr.push({case:NEW_SORTED_COLOR,start:arr.length-i-1});}return objArr;};module.exports=bubbleSort;
